proposal: Diving into the Dork Side, we see DORK LORD is not just another meme in the crypto universe; it's a quest for dominance! 🌌 With 163 holders in the ETH network, congrats on gathering a cosmic crew. Imagine enhancing this galaxy with your own DEX or launching a lottery where every DORK has a chance to win big. Our tools are designed to align with visions like yours, turning communities into creators. Let's make the crypto space a bit more dorky, together!
